description.1: We work with ready people, not necessarily “ready-made.”
description.2: If you bring the drive, we’ll bring the strategy.

bookStrategyCall.title: This Isn’t Overnight Hype.

description.0: We don’t just offer advice — we build transformation alongside you.
description.1: From uncertain freelancers to confident business owners, our clients don’t just level up — they evolve. Here’s a look at the kind of change that happens when clarity meets action.

hero.title: From “I Hope” to “I Know.” From “Someday” to “Now.”

0.after: Now I know exactly what I offer — and how to sell it.
0.before: I had too many ideas and no direction.
0.challenge: Drowning in content ideas but struggling to package anything into a paid offer
0.client: Ana, wellness coach & former full-time employee
0.result: I finally feel like I have a business, not just a side hustle.

whatWeDid.0: Narrowed her focus to 1 signature offer
whatWeDid.1: Built a clear transformation promise & value-based pricing
whatWeDid.2: Created a simple, high-converting sales page

1.before: I was posting daily and still had no clients.
1.challenge: Inconsistent income, stuck in the content grind
1.result: I stopped guessing. Now every post has a purpose — and it shows.

whatWeDid.0: Repositioned his services around client outcomes
whatWeDid.1: Set up an email funnel & inquiry process
whatWeDid.2: Audited content to speak to a defined audience

2.after: I have a roadmap, milestones, and I finally hit my first 5K month.
2.before: I knew what I wanted to offer, but didn’t know how to price it.
2.client: Leila, language tutor turned business owner
2.result: It doesn’t feel random anymore — I know where I’m going.

whatWeDid.0: Designed tiered packages with aligned pricing
whatWeDid.1: Created a personal revenue map tied to capacity
whatWeDid.2: Automated lead tracking and offer delivery

3.result: I have time to think again — not just react.

hero.description: Let’s design, refine, and elevate your business — together.
hero.title: Business Consulting Services

description.0: You didn’t build your expertise to stay stuck in burnout. Most business challenges are structural, not personal.
description.1: We help you design systems that reduce friction, sharpen focus, and scale what already works — from business models to pricing and operations. Clarity isn’t just a feeling — it drives results.

list.description: Strategy only matters if it changes what happens Monday morning. We work hands-on to design a business foundation that performs — not just looks polished on paper.

items.0: A business model you can explain — and scale with confidence
items.1: Offers that convert by solving real problems
items.2: Revenue streams that are sustainable and strategic
items.3: Pricing that reflects your value and supports growth
items.4: Operations that save time, not drain it
items.5: Systems that grow with you — not around you

list.title: We Build the Business Behind the Expertise

info.subtitle: Wondering what comes next after this foundation?
info.title: Structure That Works Harder Than You Do

quote.value: We’ve seen too many brilliant people burn out inside messy, overcomplicated businesses. Our job is to change that — with systems that support how you lead, not how others say you should. We treat every client’s business like our own — no fluff, no filler, just strategy that performs. Your time is valuable, and your growth deserves more than recycled advice.

description.0: We’re not here to clock hours or follow trends.
description.1: At Idelaria, we’re building a lean, brilliant, and thoughtful team that does work that matters — with clarity, ownership, and a shared commitment to helping real people create sustainable, purpose-driven businesses.
description.2: We don’t believe in “just doing the job.”
description.3: We believe in building something meaningful for our clients and ourselves.

howApply.description: We care more about how you think and work than where you’ve worked before.
howApply.sendEmail: Send an email to info@idelaria.com with:

steps.0: A short note about who you are and why you’re a fit
steps.1: Examples of your work or links (portfolio, website, case studies, etc.)
steps.2: The role you’re applying for in the subject line

howApply.title: How to Apply
howApply.weReview: We review every application personally. Even if we don’t have an immediate opening, we may keep your information on file for future collaborations.

description.0: This role focuses on client experience and operational oversight. As our Client Success Lead, you’ll be the connective tissue between our clients, consultants, and internal projects. You’ll ensure that everyone has what they need, deadlines remain visible, and communication stays clear and respectful.
description.1: You’re not just managing logistics — you’re upholding a standard of excellence and care. You’ll anticipate needs, handle details, and maintain momentum across multiple client journeys.

fitSkills.0: Love creating structure and clarity in moving environments
fitSkills.1: Are highly organized and proactive with follow-through
fitSkills.2: Communicate with warmth, precision, and professionalism
fitSkills.3: Enjoy being in a hybrid role between people, processes, and problem-solving
fitSkills.4: Can manage multiple client journeys without dropping the thread

niceToHave.0: Experience with CRMs, Notion, or task management tools
niceToHave.1: Familiarity with coaching, consulting, or service-based businesses
niceToHave.2: A knack for writing clear, friendly emails and updates

clientSuccessLead.quote: Hold the thread. Keep the flow. Deliver the experience.

responsibilities.0: Ensuring client needs are met and deadlines are met
responsibilities.1: Managing project timelines, session schedules, and deliverables
responsibilities.2: Acting as the first point of contact for client communication
responsibilities.3: Gathering session notes, resources, and client inputs
responsibilities.4: Tracking progress and surfacing any red flags
responsibilities.5: Supporting the founder with light admin and project coordination
responsibilities.6: Ensuring a smooth and professional experience from onboarding to offboarding

clientSuccessLead.subtitle: (Part-Time or Contract)
clientSuccessLead.title: Client Success Lead

marketingStrategist.compensation: Project-based or retainer, depending on fit

description.0: This role is ideal for someone who thrives on both creative storytelling and strategic systems. As a Marketing Strategist, you’ll collaborate directly with our founder and clients to design marketing frameworks that drive visibility, demand, and results, without resorting to burnout tactics or noise.
description.1: You’ll be responsible for building full-funnel strategies, positioning offers, and creating content plans that support long-term growth, not just short-term clicks. You’ll also support in refining client messaging, auditing marketing assets, and occasionally jumping into client sessions or Loom feedback rounds to help guide execution.

fitSkills.0: Love helping people simplify their message and amplify their reach
fitSkills.1: Have experience with service-based businesses or creator brands
fitSkills.2: Understand how content, email, and funnels work together
fitSkills.3: Can speak both strategy and execution, and know when each is needed
fitSkills.4: Know how to guide, not just tell
fitSkills.5: Enjoy contributing to something that’s growing — and growing fast

niceToHave.0: Experience with tools like ConvertKit, Notion, and Airtable
niceToHave.1: Past work with small brands, coaches, or freelancers
niceToHave.2: Familiarity with storytelling frameworks or digital copywriting

marketingStrategist.quote: Help solo entrepreneurs become unforgettable brands.

responsibilities.0: Auditing and refining existing brand messaging
responsibilities.2: Developing audience profiles and content themes
responsibilities.3: Advising on conversion-optimized offers and CTAs
responsibilities.4: Collaborating with the founder on positioning pivots or launches
responsibilities.5: Providing insights and analysis based on campaign performance
responsibilities.6: Translating business goals into actionable marketing workflows

marketingStrategist.subtitle: (Part-Time or Contract)
marketingStrategist.title: Marketing Strategist

description.0: As an Operations & Systems Consultant, you’ll work behind the scenes to help solo founders streamline their workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and build the systems they need to support growth without the overwhelm. You’ll take high-level goals and transform them into transparent, well-documented processes that clients can rely on.
description.1: This is a blend of systems thinking, operational mapping, and client collaboration. You’re not just solving problems — you’re creating ease, structure, and the ability to scale.

fitSkills.0: Think in systems and enjoy turning complexity into order
fitSkills.1: Can translate messy notes into structured workflows
fitSkills.2: Have experience working with solo founders, creators, or consultants
fitSkills.3: Are tech-comfortable and quick to learn new tools
fitSkills.4: Enjoy helping others move faster, with less friction

niceToHave.0: Experience with automation tools (Zapier, Make, etc.)
niceToHave.2: Ability to create simple Loom walkthroughs for clients

operationsSystemsConsultant.quote: Turn chaos into clarity for growing personal brands.

responsibilities.0: Auditing and optimizing internal client workflows
responsibilities.1: Mapping out scalable SOPs, automations, and CRM processes
responsibilities.2: Recommending and implementing tools (e.g., Airtable, Notion, Zapier)
responsibilities.3: Assisting clients with backend setup (booking systems, pipelines, forms)
responsibilities.4: Creating dashboards and visibility tools for progress tracking
responsibilities.5: Collaborating with the team to ensure systems align with the strategy

operationsSystemsConsultant.subtitle: (Part-Time or Contract)

steps.0: A thoughtful team that values autonomy and respect
steps.1: Flexible working hours — results over constant availability

consultingReasons.title: Why Idelaria?

0.description: Working with Idelaria gave me the structure, clarity, and momentum I didn’t know I was missing.
0.name: Ana Ruiz
0.review: I finally feel in control of my business — not buried by it.

1.description: Their process is sharp, personalized, and actually works. It’s consulting that gets results, not confusion.

2.description: Everything now runs smoother — and I finally have time to lead, not just react.

2.review: They helped me build systems I didn’t even know I needed.

3.name: Ravi Mehta
3.review: They didn’t just give me advice — they helped me build.

4.description: Idelaria helped me turn what I do into a real business model, with offers, pricing, and systems that finally make sense.
4.name: James Carter

5.description: I came in overwhelmed and second-guessing everything. Within weeks, I had a roadmap, momentum, and decisions I could stand behind.
5.name: Danielle Moore

0.description: Idelaria helped me clarify my message, streamline my funnel, and finally connect with the clients I actually wanted.
0.name: Jordan Price
0.review: I stopped guessing — and started growing.

1.description: My audience used to scroll past. Now they stop, read, and convert. The difference in clarity and confidence is unreal.
1.name: Eli Navarro
1.review: They helped me find my voice — and turn it into sales.

2.description: They didn’t just help with strategy — they taught me how to think about marketing like a business owner.
2.name: Devon Hale
2.review: Every campaign feels like it has a purpose now.

3.review: I finally feel like my brand has a direction — and a system that backs it up.

4.description: From funnel design to campaign rollout, everything we do now has purpose. We’re seeing better engagement and qualified leads every week.

5.description: Now, I have a real system that brings in leads without burnout. My messaging finally clicks — and so do my results.

0.text: We hop on a free strategy call to uncover where you are, where you want to go, and what’s been holding you back. Clarity starts here.

1.title: Your Strategy, Your Way

3.title: Let’s Build It Together

4.text: We check progress, make smart adjustments, celebrate wins, and scale what works. Strategy isn’t static — we evolve as you do.
4.title: Review. Refine. Repeat.

description.0: You’re already doing the work — now let’s make sure the right people see it, value it, and act. We help you build a strategy-first marketing system that drives attention and action.

description.3: No noise. No guesswork. Just marketing that performs — and compounds over time.

info.subtitle: Interested in how we turn strategy into action?
info.title: Visibility Is Only Half The Story, Conversion Is the Rest

quote.value: We’ve seen too many brilliant people burn out inside messy, overcomplicated businesses. Our job is to change that — with systems that support how you lead, not how others say you should. We treat every client’s business like our own — no fluff, no filler, just strategy that performs. Because your time is valuable, and your growth deserves more than recycled advice.

card.0: See How We Can Help You

bring-vision.description: Together, we build something that lasts.

lookingFor.title: Looking for more insights that actually move the needle?

bring-vision.title: You Bring the Vision. We Bring the Framework.

description.0: We stepped into consulting with a purpose, not by chance
description.1: Our work began with a personal challenge: building a business that felt aligned, sustainable, and true to our values. Like many of the individuals we now support, we had the skills, the ambition, and a long list of ideas — but no clear structure to turn them into something that worked. We set out to create that structure for ourselves: something that didn’t lead to burnout, dilute our identity, or rely on generic blueprints.
description.2: The more we tested, built, and refined, the more we realized the value of what we were creating — not just for us, but for others navigating the same complexity. That’s when Idelaria was born: not as a pivot, but as a deliberate response to a need we deeply understood. We didn’t follow someone else’s model. We created one — and now, we help others do the same.

description.0: What started as solving our roadblocks — pricing, messaging, systems, and growth — eventually turned into a repeatable framework.
description.1: It worked for us. Then it worked for others. And eventually, it became Idelaria.
description.2: Today, we partner with individuals who are ready to grow with intention — creators, service providers, freelancers, educators, strategists, and everyone in between.

value.0: People who want their work to mean something.
value.2: People who want their business to feel as good as it looks on paper.

desc.0: We’re not about vanity metrics. But we are about meaningful progress.
desc.1: Here’s what we’ve helped our clients achieve — and what we’re proud to stand behind:

0.subtitle: of clients doubled their revenue
0.text: From freelancers to solo founders — clarity and structure pay off

2.text: As time is a resource, and yours should be respected.

3.subtitle: client retention
3.text: We don’t do “one and done.” We build long-term wins with long-term people.

description.0: We don’t believe success means building the biggest, loudest brand in the room.
description.1: We believe it means building a business that aligns with your life, values, and your unique concept of freedom.
description.2: At Idelaria, growth isn’t about shouting louder.
description.3: It’s about thinking, executing better, and showing up with confidence — even on the messy days.

item.1: Business systems that serve you, not the other way around
